biography: Himalaya is a global health and personal care organization. We develop safe herbal products that bring Happiness through Wellness.

latestIgtvVideos.title: FRESH START Foundation
latestIgtvVideos.caption:
Meet Fayak. A man with a dream to play football for his country. When an accident stole away this dream, it didn't stop him from pursuing a different version of the same dream.
.
We are honoured to be a footnote in his success story. Himalaya Fresh Start Foundation believes that determination has no disability. We have set out with the objective to help people with physical challenges through appropriate medical intervention so as to enable them to be self reliant.
.
.
#FreshStart #freshstartfoundation  #himalayafreshstart #csr #beautywithapurpose #empower #empowerment #differentlyabled #differentlyablednotdisabled #morepowertoyou

latestIgtvVideos.title: My First Pimple
latestIgtvVideos.caption:
Repost via @sonali_swami
.
The story of my resilience and perseverance as a woman

I was really happy to share my life's experience with teenagers.
There is a need to drive conversations around common puberty problems like pimples. Teenagers should be encouraged to understand and embrace these changes.
Being a mother of two teenagers, I can completely relate with the struggles common during this phase of life. So, I was glad I could connect with these young minds through My First Pimple Webinar by @himalaya_facecare and talk to them about how to face and confidently overcome problems in the teenage years.
.
.
.#pimplefreehealthyskinexpert #myfirstpimple #HimalayaNeemFaceWash #pimplefreehealthyskin #healthyskin #skincareindia #proudlyindian #vocalforlocal #jantaarmy #prideofindia #atmanirbhar #HimalayaFacecare

latestIgtvVideos.title: Shortest Horror Story- PIMPLE!
latestIgtvVideos.caption:
#repost @mscocoqueen
・・・
Shortest Horror Story- PIMPLE! 👹
Prepping for a big day and waking up to a nasty pimple was my teenage pimple story :/
And using soap on my face added to the horror because these harsh soaps were actually increasing my pimples. That's when I learnt that soaps can be actually harsh on pimples and they are not meant to be used on pimple-prone skin. 
Eventually, I switched to Himalaya Purifying Neem Face Wash which is a soap-free solution and filled with the goodness of neem 🌿
Since then there has been no going back! 
What is/was your pimple horror story? #PimpleHaiToSoapNahi
@himalaya_facecare #ad #cocoxhimalaya
